section_intents: concept: explain ownership transfer at function boundaries
worked_example: pass String to function and return it

file_intents: src/lib.rs: stub function take_and_return(s: String) -> String

case_intents: tests/tests.rs: verify take_and_return returns the same string value

exercise_description: Implement take_and_return which takes a String by value and returns it to the caller.
